page.title: 09Information and travel
page.content: Regular visits of local authority mobile library. Some daily deliveries of newspapers and magazines, otherwise to be collected from Croston or Tarleton (average 3 miles). Most homes also obtain news via TV and radio. Most homes have private telephones, there being only one public telephone box. One postal collecting box. Post Offices at Rufford and Tarleton, with daily postal deliveries. Most homes own private transport. Hourly bus services on two major trunk roads. Railway stations at Rufford and Croston (average 3 miles distant)
